StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: Competent professional with over 1 year of experience in Data Analytics & Business Intelligence with expertise in: o Developing software solutions, gathering requirements, providing used cases for business, functional & technical requirements o Executing data mining, information extraction and classification using statistical and linguistic method o Analyzing information needs through a regular interaction with clients Exposure in documentation (functional specifications, technical design), coding and maintenance of proposed applications Insightful knowledge of utilizing data from diverse information systems to build tools and forecasting models that remarkably improve organizational decision-making capabilities Skilled in Big Data Analysis; established scalable, efficient, automated processes for large scale data analysis Merit of managing the entire gamut of Project management from inception to execution for Swarovski and Global Brands as a Project Lead

PositionHistory.Title: Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Key Result Areas: Creating project plans in accordance with project management framework standards and procedures; identifying ongoing issues within project plans, in order to eliminate implementation issues, using Case Analysis, Gap Analysis, Test Plans, Surveys, and Questionnaire Studying and analysing business processes & procedures and designed & implementing automated business solutions
https://freesearch.naukri.com/preview/printResume?uname=644 0c015948635e4c52481d460e560c6&sid=3810263223&AT=1580681694 2/2/20 23&15
for clients in the industry Managing Data Analysis, Data Structures, Data Mapping, Data Validation and Data Visualization, Storage based on the business need Synthesizing & communicating results to clients and internal teams and collaborating with client & internal teams to implement solutions Structuring and shaping client engagements and solving complex client challenges Working closely with business and engineering teams to encourage statistical best practices with respect to experimental design, data capture and data analysis Performing value-added quantitative & statistical analysis and providing recommendations to improve rules performance; identifying & remediating any inconsistencies or gaps in data and metrics Guiding teams in collecting & processing raw data in- coordination with modelling team to create high quality deliverables Administering the usage of SSIS in case of multiple files at FTP for the correct integration of all these files into a single table in SQL server
Highlights: Worked as a Project Lead for: o Swarovski (11 Markets including USA, China, France, Australia and many more) o Global Brands (1 Market - US)

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 34% of this job

Degree.Comments: UG: B.Tech/B.E. (Other Engineering) from Jadavpur University in 2018

Qualifications.QualificationSummary:
Key Skills: Data Analyst, Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Statistical Analysis, Project Execution, Requirement Gathering, Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Web Analytics, Data Warehousing, Data Visualization, Data Mapping, Gap Analysis, SQL Server, Python
Verified: Phone Number | Email - id

2/2/20 23&15
ABHISHEK KUMAR
Analyst, Seeking roles in Data Analytics, Business Intelligence, Statistical Analysis, Project Execution, Requirement Gathering, Data Mining, Big Data Analytics, Web Analytics, Data Warehousing, Data Visualization, Data Mapping, Gap Analysis, SQL Server, Python
Current Designation: Analyst Total Experience: 1 Year(s) 5 Month(s) Current Company: Ipsos Research Pvt. Ltd. Notice Period: 2 Months Current Location: Bengaluru / Bangalore Highest Degree: B.Tech/B.E. [Other Engineering] Pref.
